model.name: Sporty Tailored Carrot Pants
model.disambiguatingDescription: A summery spin on a classic pair of carrot pants. The timeless high-waisted silhouette is tailored from lightweight Oxford cotton poplin with smart pleats that create flattering volume. Contrasting buttons and utility style flap pockets add a sporty touch, while the front fastening makes a dressy statement. Discreetly signed on one leg with an embroidered LV Circle.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• Main Material : 100% Cotton
  • Bleu Oxford, Blue
  • Regular fit
  • Model wears size 36
  • Model measurements : Bust 30'' / 76 cm, Height 5' 9" / 175 cm, Waist 22'' / 56 cm, Hips 35'' / 88cm
  • Made in Italy
  • Do not wash
  • Do not bleach
  • Do not tumble dry
  • Iron at a maximum sole-plate temperature of 110°C
  • Mild professionnal dry cleaning in hydrocarbons

model.color: ブルーオックスフォード
